StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetContrac.ngGoalDViewForMCRC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @MCRC int AS
SELECT DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID AS DIST_ORGANIZATION_ID, RS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS_ORGANIZATION_ID, MC.MONTH_CODE, CMP.MISSION_VALUE FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP OM_REG INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM_DIST ON OM_REG.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OM_DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION DIST ON OM_DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM_RS ON OM_DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OM_RS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS ON OM_RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = RS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN CMP ON RS.ORGANIZATION_ID = CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE MC ON CMP.MONTH_CODE = MC.MONTH_CODE WHERE OM_REG.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MCRC AND RS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = 'CMC' AND CMP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND CMP.MONTH_CODE > 0 ORDER BY --- ORDER BY REGION, DISTRICT SHORT NAME, RS SHORT NAME AND MONTH OM_REG.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID, DIST.SHORT_NAME, RS.SHORT_NAME, MC.DISPLAY_ORDER
